title: K-Beauty Brand 'Dr.ForHair' Debuts In The U.S. At Costco | Beauty Packaging
text:
The Korean beauty brand's best-selling Folligen shampoo is now available on Costco Online. Cookies help us to provide you with an excellent service. By using our website, you declare yourself in agreement with our use of cookies. You can obtain detailed information about the use of cookies on our website by clicking on "More information”.
